alert.note: Alert for Lower Kobuk Valley; Upper Kobuk Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 23 at 4:21PM AKDT until October 24 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, with periods of freezing rain. Periods of blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Lower Kobuk Valley and Upper Kobuk Valleys. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Kobuk Valley; Upper Kobuk Valleys
